abstract: Just days after Nordic investment bank D. Carnegie lost its board and chief executive as a result of trading irregularities, two of its competitors have emerged as its largest owners, triggering takeover speculations.
lead_paragraph: Just days after Nordic investment bank D. Carnegie lost its board and chief executive as a result of trading irregularities, two of its competitors have emerged as its largest owners, triggering takeover speculations.

headline.main: Nordic Investment Bank’s Woes Spark Deal Chatter
